"blank convert prediction result into one hot i run blank neural network prediction expecting one hot result and got back numbers as follow:..[[0.33058667182922363, 0.3436272442340851, 0.3257860243320465], .[0.32983461022377014, 0.3487854599952698, 0.4213798701763153], .[0.3311253488063812, 0.3473075330257416, 0.3215670585632324], .[0.38368630170822144, 0.35151687264442444, 0.3247968554496765], .[0.3332786560058594, 0.343686580657959, 0.32303473353385925]]...how can i convert the array into one hot result, i.e...[[0,1,0],.[0,0,1],.[0,1,0],.[1,0,0].[0,1,0]]"
